steps.title: Prep the Ingredients
instructions: In a large skillet, brown the ground beef and Italian sausage over medium heat. Once browned, drain excess fat.
Add chopped onions and minced garlic to the skillet and cook until onions are translucent.
Stir in crushed tomatoes, tomato sauce, and tomato paste. Season with salt, black pepper, sugar, Italian seasoning, dried basil, and fennel seeds. Let simmer for about 15 minutes.
In a separate bowl, combine ricotta cheese with a beaten egg, chopped fresh parsley, and half of the grated Parmesan cheese.

steps.title: Prepare the Lasagna Noodles
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.
Cook the lasagna noodles according to the package instructions until they are just al dente. Drain and set aside.

steps.title: Assemble the Lasagna
instructions: Spread a thin layer of the meat sauce in the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish.
Layer lasagna noodles over the sauce.
Spread a portion of the ricotta cheese mixture over the noodles, followed by a layer of mozzarella cheese.
Repeat the layering process until all ingredients are used, finishing with a layer of meat sauce and a generous topping of mozzarella and the remaining Parmesan cheese.

steps.title: Bake the Lasagna
instructions: Cover the baking dish with aluminum foil and bake in the preheated oven for 25 minutes.
Remove the foil and continue to bake for another 25 minutes, or until the cheese is bubbly and golden brown.

steps.title: Rest and Serve
instructions: Allow the lasagna to rest for 10-15 minutes before slicing.
Serve warm with a side of garlic bread or a green salad.
